poem:
**Greenland's Allure**

Amid icy stillness,  
the whispers of ambition—  
a vast, unending white.  
Trump Jr roams,  
a visitor in a land of hushed echoes,  
not to purchase,  
but to ponder beneath the cold skies.  
Here, ancient icebergs cradle secrets  
untouched by dreams  
of grandeur's fleeting grasp.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Trump Jr expected to visit Greenland on Tuesday amid father’s interest in island Donald Trump Jr is expected to land in Greenland on Tuesday, hours after his father reiterated his interest in taking control of the Arctic autonomous territory, pledging to “make Greenland great again”. Trump Jr said in a podcast that aired on Monday that he was “not buying Greenland” but that he was going on a “very long, personal day trip”. He added:". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
